# MCC javascript library

## Install

```
npm install mcc-js
```

## Import

CommonJS

```
var MCCJS = require('mcc-js');
```

Front end

```
<script type="text/javascript" src="/browserify-mcc.js"></script>

# 或者
<script type="text/javascript" src="/browserify-mcc-min.js"></script>

# 访问
console.log(window.MCCJS)
```



## Usage
